lyrics:
3 contributorslonely boy lyricsim just a lonely boy
lonely and blue

ill give you my love

im just a lonely boy
lonely and blue
im all alone
with nothin to do

ive got everything
you could think of
but all i want
is someone to love
see paul anka liveget tickets as low as 73you might also likesomebody somebody somebody please
send her to me
ill make her happy
just wait and see

ive prayed so hard

that i might find
someone to love

im just a lonely boy
lonely and blue
im all alone
